alert.note: Alert for Mainland Dare; Mainland Hyde; Tyrrell (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 1:42PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hyde, west central Dare and southeastern Tyrrell Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 141 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over New Holland, or 29 miles southwest of Stumpy Point, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gum Neck, Gull Rock, New Holland, Nebraska, Lake Landing, Middletown, Fort Landing, Lake Mattamuskeet and Frying Pan Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EDT for eastern North Carolina.
